reuters.title: HADSON CORP <HADS.O> COMPLETES ACQUISITION
reuters.body: Hadson Corp said it completed the acquisition of 85 pct of the Seaxe Energy Corp's <SEAX.O> common stock for 182,415 shares of Hadson's stock. Seaxe is engaged in international oil and gas exploration and development primarily in the Paris basin of France. Reuter 
